verses.verse: Therefore <WG3606>, holy <WG40> brothers <WG80>, partakers <WG3353> of the heavenly <WG2032> calling <WG2821>, consider <WG2657> the Apostle <WG652> and <WG2532> High Priest <WG749> of <WG3671> our <WG2257> profession <WG3671>, Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424>;
Who was <WG5607> faithful <WG4103> to him that appointed <WG4160> him <WG846>, as <WG5613> also <WG2532> Moses <WG3475> was faithful in <WG1722> all <WG3650> his <WG846> house <WG3624>.

For <WG1063> this <WG3778> man was counted worthy <WG515> of <WG1391> more <WG4119> glory <WG1391> than <WG3844> Moses <WG3475>, in <WG2596> asmuch as <WG3745> he who has built <WG2680> the house <WG846> has <WG2192> more <WG4119> honor <WG5092> than the house <WG3624>.
For <WG1063> every <WG3956> house <WG3624> is built <WG2680> by <WG5259> some <WG5100> man <WG1161>; but he that built <WG2680> all things <WG3956> is God <WG2316>.

And <WG2532> Moses <WG3475> truly <WG3303> was faithful <WG4103> in <WG1722> all <WG3650> his <WG846> house <WG3624>, as <WG5613> a servant <WG2324>, for <WG1519> a testimony <WG3142> of those things which were to be spoken after <WG2980>;

But <WG1161> Christ <WG5547> as <WG5613> a son <WG5207> over <WG1909> his own <WG846> house <WG3624>; whose <WG3739> house <WG3624> are we <WG2070>, if <WG1437> we <WG2249> hold fast <WG2722> the confidence <WG3954> and <WG2532> the rejoicing <WG2745> of the hope <WG1680> firm <WG949> unto <WG3360> the end <WG5056>.
Therefore <WG1352> (as <WG2531> the <WG4151> Holy <WG40> Spirit <WG4151> says <WG3004>, To day <WG4594> if <WG1437> you will hear <WG191> his <WG846> voice <WG5456>,
Harden <WG4645> not <WG3361> your <WG5216> hearts <WG2588>, as <WG5613> in <WG1722> the provocation <WG3894>, in <WG2596> the day <WG2250> of temptation <WG3986> in <WG1722> the wilderness <WG2048>:
When <WG3757> your <WG5216> fathers <WG3962> tempted <WG3985> me <WG3165>, tested <WG1381> me <WG3165>, and <WG2532> saw <WG1492> my <WG3450> works <WG2041> forty <WG5062> years <WG2094>.

Therefore <WG1352> I was grieved with <WG4360> that <WG1565> generation <WG1074>, and <WG2532> said <WG2036>, They do <WG4105> always <WG104> err <WG4105> in <WG2588> their heart <WG2588>; and <WG1161> they <WG846> have <WG1097> not <WG3756> known <WG1097> my <WG3450> ways <WG3598>.
So <WG5613> I swore <WG3660> in <WG1722> my <WG3450> wrath <WG3709>, They shall <WG1525> not <WG1487> enter <WG1525> into <WG1519> my <WG3450> rest <WG2663>.)

Take care <WG991>, brothers <WG80>, lest <WG3379> there be <WG2071> in <WG1722> any <WG5100> of you <WG5216> an <WG2588> evil <WG4190> heart <WG2588> of unbelief <WG570>, in <WG1722> departing <WG868> from <WG575> the living <WG2198> God <WG2316>.

But <WG235> exhort <WG3870> one another <WG1438> <WG99999> daily <WG2596>, <WG2250> while <WG891> <WG99999> it is called <WG2564> To day <WG4594>; lest <WG3363> any <WG5100> of <WG1537> you <WG5216> be hardened <WG4645> through the deceitfulness <WG539> of sin <WG266>.

For <WG1063> we are made <WG1096> partakers <WG3353> of Christ <WG5547>, if <WG1437> we hold <WG2722> the beginning <WG746> of our confidence <WG5287> steadfast <WG949> unto <WG3360> the end <WG5056>;

While <WG1722> it is said <WG3004>, To day <WG4594> if <WG1437> you will hear <WG191> his <WG846> voice <WG5456>, harden <WG4645> not <WG3361> your <WG5216> hearts <WG2588>, as <WG5613> in <WG1722> the provocation <WG3894>.
For <WG1063> some <WG5100>, when they had heard <WG191>, did provoke <WG3893>: but <WG235> not <WG3756> all <WG3956> that came <WG1831> out of <WG1537> Egypt <WG125> by <WG1223> Moses <WG3475>.

But <WG1161> with whom <WG5101> was he grieved <WG4360> forty <WG5062> years <WG2094>? Was it not <WG3780> with them that had sinned <WG264>, whose <WG3739> carcasses <WG2966> fell <WG4098> in <WG1722> the wilderness <WG2048>?

And <WG1161> to whom <WG5101> swore he <WG3660> that <WG3361> they should <WG1525> not <WG3361> enter <WG1525> into <WG1519> his <WG846> rest <WG2663>, but <WG1487> <WG99999> to them that believed not <WG544>?
So <WG2532> we see <WG991> that <WG3754> they could <WG1410> not <WG3756> enter in <WG1525> because of <WG1223> unbelief <WG570>.
